title: Fire Lake
description: Grace Rampling and her lover, Sgt. Adam Davis, escape for a weekend to a remote Northern Canadian lake, in the pristine wilderness. What should be a peaceful holiday suddenly erupts into chaos, when in the middle of the night, an arsonistâ€™s fire shocks them out of their love nest. They rush across the dark water to make a hideous discovery: an Indigenous veteran is dead. He had once protected Grace, and she is devastated to find him murdered in the forest. But soon, Grace and Adam's attention is diverted by a terrifying realization.Someone is lurking in the dark, and they might be next.
author: J.C. Paulson
